title: Scheduled myki maintenance Saturday 7 December, 12am to 2am
articleContent:
myki instant top ups through PTV app will be unavailable while planned maintenance take place from 12am to 2am on Saturday 7 December.

Access to the instant top up function will resume following the updates.

During the updates, you can top up your myki card at:

  • hundreds of shops including 7-Eleven within the myki boundary
  • myki machines at selected stations and stops
  • premium station ticket offices
  • PTV Website (Online top up may take around 45 minutes)

Find your nearest place to top up.

Thank you for your patience while we complete these updates.
